description.english: Spend 10,000 gold coins in a single run in the "Hearth Siege" gamemode

description.tchinese: 在Rogue模式中單局消費10000金幣

description.english: Obtain 1000 or more coins from a "Chanced Encounter" during defensive tactics
description.schinese: 在防守策略“机遇”事件中单次获得1000或以上金币
description.tchinese: 在防守策略“機遇”事件中單次獲得1000或以上金幣
description.japanese: 防衛戦略「機会」イベントで一度に1000ゴールド獲得

description.english: Obtain a Shiny Yaoling from "The Magician" encounter during defensive tactics

description.english: Spend 1000 coins during a single "Tavern" encounter during defensive tactics
